principles: D0 paths must be fully receipts-backed and reproducible
D1 may use distributional or approximate methods but must be bounded and observable
D2 is exploratory and must be fenced to Pathfinder and non-production contexts

geometry_and_visualization.note: When AGUA geometry configs and PCT workflows are used together, the preferred TUI geometry modes from geometry_profiles_registry.v1 + geometry_mode.v1 SHOULD be referenced so operators know how to view the workload

geometry_aware_monitoring.notes: PCT methods may be monitored in geometry-aware TUI views. Link typical methods to default geometry modes (e.g., hyperbolic embeddings -> Poincare Disk, wormhole flows -> Wormhole Throat)

cartographer.description: Analysis and mapping phase for understanding solution landscapes

pathfinder.description: Exploratory phase for discovering solution spaces

trailblazer.description: Production compilation phase for creating deployable workflows

mathematical_foundations.exploration_bounds: D2 exploration limited by entropy thresholds

tier_violation.logic: If Trailblazer phase requests D1/D2 operation, raise error

workflow_inconsistency.logic: Detect cyclic dependencies in canonized workflows
